name: Technocraft Pakistan
overview:
Technocraft Pakistan is a leading web hosting company based in Pakistan established in 2001. Technocraft Pakistan has a good clientele and has gained the trust of clients in a very short time. Presently there are more than 1200 clients hosted on their dedicated servers.

Technocraft Pakistan has launched a Search Engine Optimization services for those companies who what to be on first page of Google, yahoo or Bing search engines.

“We are charging very nominal fee of 200$ per shot for all business related companies who are interested to be on top pages of Google or any other search engines,” told here by CEO Technocraft Pakistan in a press briefing.

Millions of people daily use google or yahoo.com to search product lelated companies even they are buyers or sellers on the internet. SEO is like a back bone for those companies who want to reach quickly to their targeted customers.

Technocraft Pakistan has a vast experience in the SEO, and can help all those companies who are interested to reach to their target customers in hours.

Technocraft Pakistan also dealing in web hosting, web designing and domain registration since 2001 in Pakistan and has gained top ranking on Google, yahoo.com
